Database Schema Setup

This will update your database schema to support OneDrive integration:

  • â€¢ documents table - Add OneDrive metadata columns
  • â€¢ microsoft_tokens table - Store authentication tokens
  • â€¢ onedrive_sync_log table - Track sync operations
  • â€¢ indexes - Optimize query performance

Configuration Guide

1. Azure App Registration

  • â€¢ Go to Azure Portal â†’ App Registrations
  • â€¢ Create new registration: "ITGlue OneDrive Integration"
  • â€¢ Set redirect URI: http://localhost:3002/api/auth/callback/microsoft
  • â€¢ Add API permissions: Files.ReadWrite, Files.ReadWrite.All, User.Read
  • â€¢ Create client secret

2. Environment Variables

MICROSOFT_CLIENT_ID=your_client_id
MICROSOFT_CLIENT_SECRET=your_secret
MICROSOFT_TENANT_ID=your_tenant_id
MICROSOFT_REDIRECT_URI=http://localhost:3002/api/auth/callback/microsoft
ONEDRIVE_ROOT_FOLDER=ITGlue_Documents

3. Install Dependencies

npm install @microsoft/microsoft-graph-client
